welcome: Welcome! Use /help for information about commands.
startFirst: Please start the bot first with /start
addRepoFormat: Please specify the repository in the format owner/repo
alreadySubscribed: You are already subscribed to this repository
subscribedNoToken: Subscribed to {repo}. Connect a GitHub token with /connect to set up the webhook automatically
subscriptionFailed: Subscription to {repo} failed, webhook setup error: {message}
removeRepoFormat: Please provide the repository to remove
notSubscribed: You are not subscribed to this repository
noSubscriptions: There are no subscriptions in this chat.
connectTokenFormat: Please provide a GitHub token, e.g., /connect YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN
language_changed_chat: Language for this chat has been changed!
help:
Available commands:
/start - Register
/connect github_token - Connects your GitHub
/add owner/repo - Subscribe
/remove owner/repo - Unsubscribe
/list - Show subscriptions
/settings - Open chat settings
/help - Show this message
adminOnly: This command is only for chat administrators.
deleteMsgConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
language_select_title: Choose the language for this chat:
deleteSubConfirmPrompt: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to delete this subscription?
setThreadInstruction: To move notifications for {repo}, go to the desired topic and send the command: /setthread {repo} To send notifications to the main chat (not in a topic), use: /setthread {repo} general
setThreadSuccess: Notifications for {repo} will now be sent to this topic.
setThreadSuccessGeneral: Notifications for {repo} will now be sent to the general chat.
setThreadInsideTopic: To set a topic, please run this command inside the desired topic.
event_push.title: 📏 Push to {repoName}:{branch}
event_issues.title: 📌 Issue {action} ({state}): {repoName} {issueTitle} #{issueNumber} by {user}
event_pull_request.title:
📝 PR {action} ({commits} commits): {repoName} {prTitle} 
{body}
👤 {user} #{prNumber}
event_create.title: 🖇 New {refType} {ref} at {repoName} 👤 {user}
event_fork.title: 🍴 Forked: {repoName} 🌐 {forks} 🔗 {forkeeName} 👤 {forkeeOwner} Original: {repoName}
